title: Where the area of site having non-buildable / open space reservation, is more than 500 Sq
clause_text: Where the area of site having non-buildable / open space reservation, is more than 500 Sq.m. such sites may be allowed to be developed for slum redevelopment subject to condition that the ground area of the land so used shall not be more than 65% of the reservation and leaving 35% rendered clear thereafter for the reservation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
